TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi abstract beforefieldinit RealProxy extends System.Object

span.span: Provides base functionality for proxies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是`abstract`代理必须从中派生的基类。The class is the `abstract` base class from which proxies must derive. 使用一个对象，可跨任何类型的远程处理边界的客户端实际上通过的对象的透明代理。A client that uses an object across any kind of a remoting boundary is actually using a transparent proxy for the object. 透明代理提供了实际对象驻留在客户端的空间中的视觉效果。The transparent proxy provides the illusion that the actual object resides in the client's space. 通过将转发到使用远程处理基础结构的实际对象对其所做的调用来实现这。It achieves this by forwarding calls made on it to the real object using the remoting infrastructure. 透明代理是由类型的托管运行时类的实例本身。The transparent proxy is itself housed by an instance of a managed runtime class of type . 实现从透明代理转发操作所需的功能的一部分。The implements a part of the functionality that is needed to forward the operations from the transparent proxy. 请注意，代理对象继承的托管对象，如垃圾收集、 支持字段和方法，相关联的语义，并且可以扩展到新窗体的类。Note that a proxy object inherits the associated semantics of managed objects such as garbage collection, support for fields and methods, and can be extended to form new classes. 代理具有双重特性： 它可作为远程对象 （透明代理），与相同的类的对象，它是一个托管的对象本身。The proxy has a dual nature: it acts as an object of the same class as the remote object (transparent proxy), and it is a managed object itself. 可以使用代理对象中不考虑。A proxy object can be used without regard to any remoting subdivisions within a . > [!NOTE] > 此类，可以链接要求并且在类级别继承要求。This class makes a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level. 一个直接调用方或派生的类不包含基础结构权限时引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have infrastructure permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)并[继承需求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples [!code-cpp[ChannelServices_SyncDispatchMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ChannelServices_SyncDispatchMessage/CPP/channelservices_syncdispatchmessage_client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ChannelServices_SyncDispatchMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ChannelServices_SyncDispatchMessage/CS/channelservices_syncdispatchmessage_client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ChannelServices_SyncDispatchMessage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/ChannelServices_SyncDispatchMessage/VB/channelservices_syncdispatchmessage_client.vb#1)]

span.span: For operating with infrastructure code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前方法创建透明代理，这可以通过访问方法。The current method creates a transparent proxy, which can be accessed through the method. 使用一个对象，可跨任何类型的远程处理边界的客户端实际上通过的对象的透明代理。A client that uses an object across any kind of a remoting boundary is actually using a transparent proxy for the object. 透明代理让人觉得实际对象驻留在客户端的空间。The transparent proxy gives the impression that the actual object resides in the client's space. 通过将转发到使用远程处理基础结构的实际对象对其所做的调用来实现这。It achieves this by forwarding calls made on it to the real object using the remoting infrastructure. 透明代理位于托管运行时类的实例由。The transparent proxy is housed by an instance of a managed runtime class . 实现从透明代理转发操作所需的功能的一部分。The implements a part of the functionality that is needed to forward the operations from the transparent proxy. 请注意，代理对象继承的托管对象，垃圾回收和支持字段和方法，如关联的语义，并且可以扩展到新窗体的类。Note that a proxy object inherits the associated semantics of managed objects such as garbage collection and support for fields and methods, and can be extended to form new classes. 代理具有双重特性： 它可作为远程对象 （透明代理），与相同的类的对象，是一个托管的对象本身。The proxy has a dual nature: it acts as an object of the same class as the remote object (transparent proxy), and is a managed object itself. ## Examples [!code-cpp[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/CPP/customproxy_sample.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/CS/customproxy_sample.cs#10)] [!code-vb[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/VB/customproxy_sample.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义代理用户使用存根 （stub） 数据来确定应如何处理传入的方法调用。The stub data is used by custom proxy users to decide what to do with an incoming method call. 例如，存根 （stub） 数据可能是服务器的上下文，可以使用以确定是否执行调用本地，或将其发送到远程处理基础结构的信息。For example, the stub data might be information about the server's context that you can use to determine whether to execute the call locally, or send it through the remoting infrastructure.

Public Overridable Function GetCOMIUnknown (fIsMarshalled As Boolean) As IntPtr
public: virtual IntPtr GetCOMIUnknown(bool fIsMarshalled);
abstract member GetCOMIUnknown : bool -> nativeint override this.GetCOMIUnknown : bool -> nativeint

param.name: fIsMarshalled
param.span: 如果请求该对象引用是为了封送到远程位置，则为 ；如果请求该对象引用是为了通过 COM 与当前进程中的非托管对象进行通信，则为 。

span.span: if the object reference is requested for marshaling to a remote location; if the object reference is requested for communication with unmanaged objects in the current process through COM.

summary.span: 请求对当前代理实例所表示的对象的非托管引用。

span.span: Requests an unmanaged reference to the object represented by the current proxy instance.

returns.span: 如果请求该对象引用是为了通过 COM 与当前进程中的非托管对象进行通讯，则为指向 COM 可调用包装器的指针；如果请求该对象引用是为了封送到远程位置，则为指向缓存的或新生成的 COM 接口的指针。

span.span: A pointer to a COM Callable Wrapper if the object reference is requested for communication with unmanaged objects in the current process through COM, or a pointer to a cached or newly generated COM interface if the object reference is requested for marshaling to a remote location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果代理请求进行封送处理，则`IUnknown`接口则返回当前代理实例所表示的对象。If the proxy is requested for marshaling, then an `IUnknown` interface for the object represented by the current proxy instance is returned. 如果`IUnknown`以前缓存的方法，则返回该实例; 否则，返回一个新实例。If an `IUnknown` was previously cached by the method, then that instance is returned; otherwise, a new instance is returned. 如果不进行封送处理，但与当前进程中的非托管对象进行通信需要该代理，然后[COM 可调用包装器](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md)(CCW)，这可以用于在当前进程中通信通过 COM，则返回。If the proxy is requested not for marshaling but for communication with unmanaged objects in the current process, then a [COM Callable Wrapper](~/docs/framework/interop/com-callable-wrapper.md) (CCW), which can be used in the current process for communication through COM, is returned. ## Examples [!code-cpp[RealProxy_Sample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RealProxy_Sample/CPP/realproxy_sample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[RealProxy_Sample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RealProxy_Sample/CS/realproxy_sample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[RealProxy_Sample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RealProxy_Sample/VB/realproxy_sample.vb#2)]

param.name: msg
param.span: ，包含有关方法调用的信息的 。

span.span: A that contains a of information about the method call.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写时，对当前实例所表示的远程对象调用在所提供的 中指定的方法。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, invokes the method that is specified in the provided on the remote object that is represented by the current instance.

returns.span: 调用的方法所返回的消息，包含返回值和所有 或 参数。

span.span: The message returned by the invoked method, containing the return value and any or parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当由支持的透明代理是调用，它将调用委托给方法。When the transparent proxy that is backed by the is called, it delegates the calls to the method. 方法中的消息转换`msg`到参数，并将其发送到的远程对象的当前实例表示。The method transforms the message in the `msg` parameter into a , and sends it to the remote object that is represented by the current instance of . 参数提供一个字典，通过属性。The parameter provides a dictionary through the property. 字典包含有关方法调用，如调用的方法的名称和其参数的信息的名称/值对。The dictionary contains name/value pairs of information about the method call, such as the name of the method called and its parameters. ## Examples [!code-cpp[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/CPP/customproxy_sample.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/CS/customproxy_sample.cs#4)] [!code-vb[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/VB/customproxy_sample.vb#4)]

summary.span: 存储当前实例所表示的对象的非托管代理。

span.span: Stores an unmanaged proxy of the object that is represented by the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当非托管的代理尝试与公共语言运行时通过 COM 通信时，运行时解析由非托管代理表示的远程对象。When an unmanaged proxy attempts to communicate with the common language runtime through COM, the runtime resolves the remote object that is represented by the unmanaged proxy. 如果远程对象进行管理，并且也驻留在公共语言环境，则而不是与之通信通过分布式 COM 对象是发送到当前进程。If the remote object is managed and also resides in a common language environment, then instead of communicating with it through distributed COM, the object is sent to the current process. 如果远程对象不派生自，然后，它是序列化并复制到当前的位置。If the remote object is not derived from , then it is serialized and copied to the current location. 如果派生自，然后它将返回的透明代理和远程处理基础结构会缓存该非托管的代理 (`IUnknown`接口) 中的透明代理以供将来使用。If it is derived from , then it returns a transparent proxy, and the remoting infrastructure caches the unmanaged proxy (the `IUnknown` interface) in the transparent proxy for future use. ## Examples [!code-cpp[RealProxy_Sample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RealProxy_Sample/CPP/realproxy_sample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[RealProxy_Sample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RealProxy_Sample/CS/realproxy_sample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[RealProxy_Sample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RealProxy_Sample/VB/realproxy_sample.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetStubData (System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy rp, object stubData);
.method public static hidebysig void SetStubData(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy rp, object stubData) cil managed
Public Shared Sub SetStubData (rp As RealProxy, stubData As Object)
public: static void SetStubData(System::Runtime::Remoting::Proxies::RealProxy ^ rp, System::Object ^ stubData);
static member SetStubData : System.Runtime.Remoting.Proxies.RealProxy * obj -> unit

param.name: rp
param.span: 要为其设置存根 (Stub) 数据的代理。

span.span: The proxy for which to set stub data.
The new stub data.

summary.span: 为指定的代理设置存根 (Stub) 数据。

span.span: Sets the stub data for the specified proxy.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自定义代理用户使用存根 （stub） 数据来确定应如何处理传入的方法调用。The stub data is used by custom proxy users to decide what to do with an incoming method call. 例如，存根 （stub） 数据可能是服务器的上下文，可以使用以确定是否执行调用本地，或将其发送到远程处理基础结构的信息。For example, the stub data might be information about the server's context that you can use to determine whether to execute the call locally, or send it through the remoting infrastructure. ## Examples [!code-cpp[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/CPP/customproxy_sample.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/CS/customproxy_sample.cs#3)] [!code-vb[CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CustomProxy_Attribute_RealProxy/VB/customproxy_sample.vb#3)]

exception.span: 直接调用方没有 UnmanagedCode 权限。

span.span: The immediate caller does not have UnmanagedCode permission.

permission.span: 表示调用非托管的代码的能力。

span.span: For the ability to call unmanaged code.
Demand value: ; Permission value:

public: virtual IntPtr SupportsInterface(Guid % iid);
abstract member SupportsInterface : -> nativeint override this.SupportsInterface : -> nativeint

param.name: iid
param.span: 对所请求的接口的引用。

span.span: A reference to the requested interface.

summary.span: 请求具有指定 ID 的 COM 接口。

span.span: Requests a COM interface with the specified ID.

returns.span: 指向所请求的接口的指针。

span.span: A pointer to the requested interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法，要实现其他 COM 接口代表该服务器对象的当前实例表示的当前代理实例。The method allows the current proxy instance to implement additional COM interfaces on behalf of the server object that the current instance represents. 当前方法生成所请求的接口，并返回的指针。The current method generates the requested interface and returns a pointer to it. 此方法可以生成的 COM 接口的类型取决于代理类型，进而可能依赖于当前代理实例所表示的服务器对象的类型。The types of COM interfaces that can be generated by this method depend on the proxy type, which in turn might depend on the type of the server object that the current proxy instance represents. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see . ## Examples [!code-cpp[RealProxy_Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RealProxy_Sample/CPP/realproxy_sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[RealProxy_Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RealProxy_Sample/CS/realproxy_sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[RealProxy_Sample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/RealProxy_Sample/VB/realproxy_sample.vb#1)]
